text: You are a precise, deterministic NER extractor. Return STRICT JSON with keys: items (list of {text,start,end,label}). Use character offsets on the provided text. Labels: PERSON, ORG, GPE, LOC, DATE, EMAIL, PHONE, IBAN, CREDIT_CARD, OTHER.
John Smith emailed jane.doe@example.com on 2024-09-01 in Berlin.
Invoice total paid by ACME GmbH, card 4242 4242 4242 4242.
